ovdesc.p: Application contains the position for the group defined in the application SC.VALUATION.GROUP

desc.p: This field will hold valid application ID or ALL. Fields from APPLICATION to SOURCE.ID will be associated multivalue field

This field will hold either security master id or portfolio number. Record with ID as PORTFOLIO.SUBASSET.ASSET will hold details as in SC.POS.ASSET record based on sub asset type. Record with ID as PORTFOLIO will hold child portfolio id
"Currency involved in SECURITY.NO field. In case of SECURITY.NO containing portfolio number
This will hold reference currency of that portfolio."
"This field will be total of nominal from child SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
"This field will be total of ESTIMATION from child SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
"This field will be total of MARGIN.VALUE from SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
This field will be total of TOT.UNRL.MKT from child SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset.
This field will be total of TOT.UNRL.CCY from child SC.POS.ASSET converted to reference currency of master portfolio if the record corresponds to individual asset.
"This field will be total of top up margin from SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
"This field will be total of sell out margin from SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
"This field will be total of initial margin from SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
Margin value calculated using margin value checks performed as a part of diversification.
Margin value calculated using net equity checks performed as a part of diversification.
"This field will be total of second market value from SC.POS.ASSET if the record corresponds to individual asset. However If record corresponds to portfolio
this will be the pledged amount based on the setup in SC.VALUATION.GROUP"
"If field SEP.DEPOSITORY in SC.PARAMETER is NO
this field will contain ALL. If field SEP.DEPOSITORY in SC.PARAMETER is YES
this field will contain individual depositories"

Index field contains Security and depository concatenated with * for uniqueness in identifying the depository wise details while SEP.DEPOSITORY is set in SC.PARAMETER. For Fx transactions SECURITY.CCY is concatenated to differentiate buy or sell leg position
List of derivative transactions linked to the position
This field Contains the accrued interest for the security or instrument of the corresponding master portfolio
This field is updated if the ACCRUE.DIV field in DIARY.TYPE or DIV.ACCR.TYPE field in SC.PARAMETER is set up

This field will be automatically updated by the system when building the portfolio's valuation data.Depending on what has been set in DIV.ACCR.TYPE the value will be picked up from SC.POS.ASSET.If GROSS then original accrued Dividend will be picked up from SC.POS.ASSET.If NET then Net accrued Dividend from SC.POS.ASSET will be picked up
Id of the master portfolio
